articles.title: Preparatory Committee Formed in Austria
Japanese Authorities Urged to Improve Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee Formed in Austria 
    Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- An Austrian preparatory committee was formed in Vienna on Feb.25 to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
 Max Verworner, chairman of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.    
 The committee reviewed functions held on the occasion of February 16 and decided to organize diverse functions on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the 11th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.

articles.title: GNP Accused of Patronizing Pro-Japanese Acts
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Army Academy Song and Dance Ensemble
articles.content:
GNP Accused of Patronizing Pro-Japanese Acts 
    Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The Grand National Party of south Korea on February 27 opposed laying before a plenary session of the National Assembly a special bill on probing the truth behind the pro-Japanese treacheries during the Japanese imperialists' occupation of Korea, which delayed the enactment of the special bill, according to south Korean KBS.
 The bill was slated to be passed through the Legislation and Judiciary Committee of the National Assembly on February 26 and to be laid before the plenary session that day.    
 The move of the traitorous party to patronize the pro-Japanese acts is touching off the public criticism.

articles.title: New Organization Formed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Army Academy Song and Dance Ensemble 
    Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Russian Army Academy Song and Dance Ensemble Named after Aleksandrov.
 Written on the gift are words that "All members of the Russian Army Academy Song and Dance Ensemble Named after Aleksandrov have the honour to present this to Comrade Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. February 12, 2004."
